reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, appreciating its comfortable, non-itchy feel and flattering design that nicely brings out curves. The material receives positive feedback for being thick and warm, with one customer noting it doesn't show panty lines. Customers disagree on the length, with some finding it great while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!
items.body: Everything about this sweater dress I love. The delivery, which I got next day delivery . The price, because the quality is great . The fit is as expected and the color is as pictured I'm 5' 0 1/2" and I'm 180lbs and I ordered the X-Large, but I could've gotten a Large and been ok, but I figured and X-Large would be better , because I'm bottom heavy, with hips, thighs and big butt lol I saw this same dress on fashion Nova site for about the same price BUT I would've paid more to have it delivered AND the wait would've been longer AND if it didn't fit and I'd have to return, I wouldn't get a refund, but just a store credit, SO ordering from AMAZON was the better choice The quality is great. There are no loose threads and the dress is thick enough to wear late fall and winter time on any occasion . The color is light pink and looks very nice and the material is soft, NOT ITCHY, and the material is NOT cheap looking Buy this dress, you will not be sorry. It's worth the buy Read more
items.author: toni toni toni

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars highest quality dress I've ever purchased on amazon.
items.body: I have purchased a lot of Amazon dresses and this one is by far the nicest looking. I was sorta shocked by the quality, and fully expected to return it! If you're like me and read a million reviews to make your purchase I'll sum it up to make it easy, because I read so many for this one. - Yes, it runs a *touch* big. If you're between sizes I wouldn't recommend going up because you'll be swimming in the top. It's suuuuuper forgiving material. Stretchy, soft, thicker. (Warm!) - It's MADE for curvy women like myself, but I feel like it would look good on a lot of shapes with how soft and stretchy it is. - I actually love the connecting piece of fabric on back. I am always falling out of wrap tops (this is pseudo-wrap I'd say) but this helps keep things from falling out while still offering a very flattering neckline. I am 5'5", 150-155 lbs, 36D, 29" waist, 42" hips. Got a medium, after debating a large for a long while. Was worried about the hips but honestly it's just so forgiving. It's ever so slightly tighter than I want it to be on bottom, but I wouldn't even call it an issue with how good it looks on my booty ;) Just throw on some shapewear. Hits mid-thigh, sleeves great length. Batwing arms are really pretty. Had I gotten the large the top would have been too big. Medium on my 36D chest is actually perfect. (Not too tight, not too loose.) I'll update with a photo when I'm able! Heck if I'm taking that photo with the state I'm in today though. TL;DR - GET THE DANG DRESS IT'S GORG. AND STICK WITH TTS OR SIZE DOWN. OKAY BYE. (And before I go, this shapewear is PERFECT paired with this dress: SEXYWG Womens Shapewear Tummy Control Panties Thigh Slimmer Butt Lifter Power Shorts. Just trust me. I feel like the shapewear queen these days #thankscovid) Read more
items.author: Alyssa Wagner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sexy sweater dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, thick material but not to the point it weighs you down. Lays nicely on your body and hugs curves. For reference, I'm 5'8 and 128, ordered a sz sm. Could've gone w/ xs if it came in that sz. Biggest issue, no belt with it. That's part of the item as described. I don't think im the only person who has purchased and had the same issue. Not happy at all! Read more
items.author: mar bd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a Great Dress!!!
items.body: I adore this dress!! I bought it for our New Years Dinner. The fabric is perfect and it‚Äôs not to thick so I wasn‚Äôt overly warm. It wasn‚Äôt thin at all. It fits and drapes comfortably. No pulling and tugging at it all night. Sexy but still classy! It did have that ruffling at the ends of the sleeves that some of the other reviews mentioned but that wasn‚Äôt a deal breaker for me. My watch and bracelets kind of took the attention away from it. I love that the belt is on the wider side! I felt like it helped to accentuate my waist better. I bought a large for more of a night out vibe. I really wanted to show my curves and it did just that! I would definitely get an XL for the office so it fits a bit looser on the bottom. I felt super pretty in it so I‚Äôll probably be buying a couple different colors! Definitely pleased! Go ahead and get it, girl! Read more
items.author: Diana Peralta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy but comfy-cozy!
items.body: I am a curvy girl (hour glass figure-smaller waist/wider hips) normally wear a size 12 and medium to large top. I ordered a large In the maroon and it fits very well. When I first took it out of the package I thought ‚ÄúNo way this is going to fit me!‚Äù However, it is stretchy, has some give, and really hugs my curves nicely. Thick and forgiving material but it doesn‚Äôt hide everything, if you don‚Äôt want it hugging your body, order up although I think an Xl would be too big in the arms and chest for me.. Super comfortable. Hits right above my knees because I am 5‚Äô3. I like it better without the tie Around the waist but kept the piece on the back so it is not off the shoulder. I tried it on and my husband was like ‚ÄúOh, wear that Friday night, that looks good‚Äù. So I definitely recommend purchasing it! Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like it but could use improvement
items.body: So I purchased this dress last minute 2 days before a Christmas party. I was weary of the stretch/sizing component in many of the reviews I'd read but purchased anyway hoping for the best. While some had said to size down I think those reviews were coming from petite women. I'm not quite plus sized but ordered my regular clothes size in an XL and it fit just right. The sweater material has a good amount of stretch but obviously not enough as I had to remove the back strap to wear the dress off the shoulder as pictured (the strap actually ripped before removal) and under my arm where the bodice attaches to the bottom skirt half or the dress ripped as well (luckily I had on dark undergarments that made the rip unnoticeable) All in all it is a really cute dress that could be made better. Read more
items.author: Nikol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering!
items.body: I very rarely write a review but this dress is so perfect! Very flattering and I can‚Äôt wait to wear it for Valentine‚Äôs Day. I love the material and the weight of it. It is the perfect length and just flirty enough for my liking. I got it in the mail today and I‚Äôm going to order it in a couple more colors as soon as I‚Äôm done with this review. Read more
items.author: Dmulhall

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Z-orange, Gray, Blue, Burgundy, Camel, Navy Blue, Orange, Z-white, Dark Green, White, Z-dark Green, Purple, Rose Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
